name: 陳適範
objective:
本課程在討論金屬與合金凝固之基本理論以及它的應用與控制,由熱流動,質量傳輸以及成核與晶体成長來討論凝固機制。
The course of solidification principles dealing with the fundamentals of metal and alloy solidification and how to relate these fundamentals to practice and control. Based upon the fundamentals of heat flow mass transport and nucleation crystal growth to discuss about solidification mechanisms. This course is suitable for senior-level and graduate students.
schedule:
1-6基礎理論
7-12各種凝固現象的實際應用
13～E產品評價
scorePolicy:
出席30%
報告30%
考試40%
